channel.title: 2. Using Splunk APM :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: An overview of how to use Splunk APM

item.title: 2.1 Service Map
item.description: Service Map Click on paymentservice in the service map and select version from the breakdown drop down filter underneath paymentservice. This will filter our service map by the custom span tag version. You will now see the service map has been updated like the below screenshot to show the different versions of the paymentservice. Splunk Observability shows that not only is paymentservice experiencing errors (you can see request rate vs error rate) but that this service is the root cause.

item.title: 2.2 Tag Spotlight
item.description: Tag Spotlight On the right hand side of the screen scroll down on Tag Spotlight, ensure Top Across All Indexed Tags is selected in the dropdown click the full screen button as indicated in the screenshot below. The Tag Spotlight Page will be displayed. From this page you can view the top tags in your application and their corresponding error rates and request rates.

item.title: 2.3 Example trace
item.description: Example Trace You should now see the entire trace along with the spans for the example trace that was selected. Spans which have errors are indicated by a red exclamation mark beside it. If you have a number such as x6 in a grey box, click it to expand the compacted paymentservice spans.
